org.cojen.util

Class WeakValueCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cojen.util.RefCache<K,V>
      • org.cojen.util.WeakValueCache<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache<K,V>

    public class WeakValueCache<K,V>
extends RefCache<K,V>
    Simple thread-safe cache which evicts entries via a shared background thread. Cache permits null keys, but not null values.
    Author:
    Brian S O'Neill
    See Also:
    SoftValueCache, WeakKeyCache
